Label: Polar Plasma Wave Instrument, MCA, ~1.3 sec fields - D. Gurnett (U. Iowa)

VariableDescription.Name: Fce
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           POLAR PWI MCA
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     POLAR>Polar Plasma Laboratory
#     DATA_TYPE                       H0>MCA
#     DESCRIPTOR                      PWI>Plasma Wave Instrument
#     DATA_VERSION                    2
#     TEXT                            Reference:..Gurnett, D.A. et al, The Polar plasma wave instrument, Space Science                       
#                                      Reviews, Vol. 71, pp. 597-622, 1995.GURNETT@IOWAVE.physics.uiowa.edu                                  
#                                     Note:..The electron cyclotron frequencies are derived from the following:  Fce                         
#                                      = 0.028 kHz*B, where B is the magnitude of the ambient magnetic field measured                        
#                                      in nT.  All frequencies are converted to Hz.                                                          
#                                     There are 20 MCA E frequency bands, logarithmically spaced and 14 MCA B frequency                      
#                                      bands, logarithmically spaced.                                                                        
#     MODS                            Created Dec 1997
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0171
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 po_h0_pwi_00000000_v02
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  po_h0_pwi
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Polar Plasma Wave Instrument, MCA, ~1.3 sec fields
#     PI_NAME                         D. Gurnett
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Polar
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Radio and Plasma Waves (space)
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Polar_PWI_mca_definitive_h0_cdf
#     CDFMAJOR                        ROW_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, begin time of MCA E spectrum
#  2. Electron Cyclotron Frequency, scalar
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Fri Dec  2 17:35:28 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#  2. Electron Cyclotron Frequency, scalar
#
EPOCH                   ELEC_CYC_FRQ_(FCE)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                  Hz
25-03-1996 00:00:07.724            18915.7
